file_content.text: Welcome, Jedi. I'm Hallam Organa, head of House Organa's diplomatic corps, and this is my younger, more handsome brother, Lew.
And beware the Killiks--those insect-men have terrible tempers.
House Teral is your best chance of reaching the summit, Jedi. Good luck.
Hal, House Teral--you know, with the beautiful daughter--couldn't our Jedi friend represent them?
Huh! My brother is a genius. House Teral is desperate for a representative, but the usurper Ulgo destroyed their hopes.
If you could help them defend themselves against their enemies and return them to glory, I'm sure they'd make you their delegate.
Hopefully House Teral can find use for me.
I will see what I can do.
I'm sure they will. They are in dire straits.
Where is this house?
Why would I want to represent such a worthless house?
They sound pathetic.
It's true House Teral isn't much now--but their lineage is noble.
You'll find Lord Teral in his house's last holdings, an enclave near Ulgo lands and Killik nests. I will let him know you're coming.
Please, Hallam. You do yourself an injustice. Your age gives you a stately difference.
If I wasn't wearing my extra years around my waist, I might agree. Now, Jedi, how can I help you?
I was sent to help Master Sidonie Garen with the peace process.
I'm here to help end the war.
I'm looking for Master Sidonie Garen. I believe she may be ill.
I need to help Master Sidonie.
Hmm. She seemed fine last I spoke with her.
I was told that you could put me in touch with Master Sidonie Garen.
I'm looking for Master Sidonie.
Ah, yes, Master Sidonie! Truly a remarkable woman.
You just missed her. She's at the peace summit. A peace summit on Alderaan! Imagine that!
But I'll call her. The location of the summit is a secret for obvious reasons, but I'm sure she'd welcome your assistance.
Hallam Organa. I'm sorry, but I'm very busy right now. The summit is just getting underway.
The Jedi Council sent me to help with the peace process.
I'm supposed to help.
I was hoping I could join you.
Can I come?
Master Sidonie, you may not be well. I'm here to help.
You may be ill.
You're Master Yuon's student, aren't you?
It's wonderful the Council sent you to assist me, but this is a very delicate process with no place for a Padawan.
This process is too delicate for a Master to handle alone.
You can't do it alone.
I passed my trials, and I think the Council knows what it's doing.
I'm not a Padawan.
I said, you may not be well. If so, you need help, Master Sidonie.
Again--you may be sick.
You may not be well. If so, you need help, Master Sidonie.
You may have a plague.
I've been a Master for many years, Jedi. I have things under control.
Only official representatives of the houses may attend the summit. What would the other houses think if another Jedi from House Organa showed up?
And I don't have time to debate. If you'll excuse me.
Master Sidonie! I'm sorry, Jedi. That's really not like her.
Is there any other way to get to the summit?
I need to get to her.
All the more reason why I need to get into that summit.
That's what worries me.
Yes, well, Master Sidonie said that only representatives can go.
Don't apologize! Get me into that summit!
I want help, not excuses.
Yes. Right. Of course. Master Sidonie said that only representatives can go to the summit.
Unfortunately, Organa's representative is already there.
I'm sorry. I can't talk to you right now.
